text: Edward king <gret> Willem biscop & Leofstan & Ealfsi porterefen & alle mine burchþeignes on Londone freondlice.

& icc kiþe eou þat ic habbe <geunnen> Sancte Petre into Westmunstre at þar kirkhaleginge fulne fridom ofer alle þe land þe lage into þare halagen stowe geafe se ðe his geafe & þar mide saka & socna, toll & team, infangeneþef flimenes firmðe & <grithbrice> & hamsocne & forestal & miskenninge & sceawinge & alle oðere richte in tid & ut of tid binnen burh & butan burh, on strate & offe strate swa full & swa forð swa hi me sulven firmest on hande stodan.
& gif ani mann hennen forð wille þa halegen stowe mid land & mid loge godian icc ann alswa þæt hit si staðelfast.
& icc nelle geþafian þæt eni mann habbe ani onsting ofer his land ne ofer his men ne be strande ne be lande ne þat ani man þas mundbirdnesse tobreke.
